description:
Overwhelmed by the Silver Saint Babel, Seiya and his friends are saved by the mysterious Steel Saints, who wear Cloths unlike any seen before.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friends or Foes?! The Steel Saints
Teki ka Mikata ka! Steel Saint
¡¿Enemigos o aliados?! Los Santos de Acero
敵か味方か! スチールセイント
